The court stated Israel's attempts to stop aid delivery are illegal.
This ruling addresses the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Gaza.
The decision impacts the delivery of essential supplies to Palestinians.
The ruling reinforces international law regarding humanitarian aid.

clusters.title: After five weeks of evidence, this is what we know about the Mark Haines mystery
clusters.neutral_headline: Key questions remain unanswered in Mark Haines inquest

items.title: After five weeks of evidence, this is what we know about the Mark Haines mystery
items.standfirst: Some key questions about the death of Indigenous teenager Mark Haines are still unanswered after a coronial inquest spanning five weeks.
items.content: Some key questions about the death of Indigenous teenager Mark Haines are still unanswered after a coronial inquest spanning five weeks.

ai_summary: A coronial inquest into Mark Haines' death spanned five weeks.
Several key questions about the Indigenous teenager's death remain.
The inquest provided evidence but did not fully resolve the mystery.
The investigation aimed to determine the circumstances of his death.
The unanswered questions leave the case unresolved for now.
